1. Querying the Number of Instances for Each Class

PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

SELECT ?class (COUNT(?instance) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  ?instance rdf:type ?class .
  FILTER(?class IN (lab:Author, lab:Paper, lab:Publication, lab:Topic, lab:Proceedings, lab:Volume, lab:Conference, lab:Journal, lab:Chair, lab:Editor, lab:Reviewer, lab:Review))
}
GROUP BY ?class
ORDER BY ?class



2. Querying the Number of Triples for Each Property


PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>

SELECT ?property (COUNT(?subject) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  ?subject ?property ?object .
  FILTER(?property IN (lab:writes, lab:publishedAs, lab:paperRelatedTo, lab:isIn, lab:isOf, lab:isPublishedInConference, lab:isPublishedInJournal, lab:proceedingsRelatedTo, lab:volumeRelatedTo, lab:handleConference, lab:handleJournal, lab:assigns, lab:reviewed, lab:isReviewOf))
}
GROUP BY ?property
ORDER BY ?property



3. Querying the Total Number of Triples

SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  ?s ?p ?o .
}



4. Count the Number of Instances for Each Main Class

PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

SELECT (COUNT(?instance) AS ?numAuthors)
WHERE {
  ?instance rdf:type lab:Author .
}



PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

SELECT (COUNT(?instance) AS ?numPapers)
WHERE {
  ?instance rdf:type lab:Paper .
}


SELECT (COUNT(?instance) AS ?numPublications)
WHERE {
  ?instance rdf:type lab:Publication .
}


SELECT (COUNT(?instance) AS ?numTopics)
WHERE {
  ?instance rdf:type lab:Topic .
}



SELECT (COUNT(?instance) AS ?numProceedings)
WHERE {
  ?instance rdf:type lab:Proceedings .
}



SELECT (COUNT(?instance) AS ?numVolumes)
WHERE {
  ?instance rdf:type lab:Volume .
}



5. Count the Number of Triples Using Main Properties


PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>

SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?numWrites)
WHERE {
  ?s lab:writes ?o .
}


PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>

SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?numPublishedAs)
WHERE {
  ?s lab:publishedAs ?o .
}


PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>

SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?numPaperRelatedTo)
WHERE {
  ?s lab:paperRelatedTo ?o .
}


PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>

SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?numIsIn)
WHERE {
  ?s lab:isIn ?o .
}


PREFIX lab: <http://SDM_LAB2.org/>

SELECT (COUNT(?s) AS ?numIsOf)
WHERE {
  ?s lab:isOf ?o .
}
